channel.title: How to get your private server online?
channel.description: Using No-ip DUC or Hamachi or something ? How to set it up so that it wont lag the fuck out of the computer running it ?

item.title: How to get your private server online?
item.dc:creator: @djvawter djvawter
item.description:
@djvawter wrote:

tinyscape:

use uturrent. i use that and it works, you dont have to portforward =)

lol, dude, i hear that all the time but i dont get how yal fuckin do it cuz it says port already in use…then if you start your server first then utorrent dont work cuz it will be like havin this red sign thing down at the bottom…you obviously cant do it…idk, but just cant be on the same port or some shit…lmao. if anyones got some solution then pm plz
peace

Read full topic
item.source: How to get your private server online?

item.title: How to get your private server online?
item.dc:creator: @benny679 benny679
item.description:
@benny679 wrote:

Use No-IP. You have to open a port in your router and your computer. That leaves your computer venerable, but thats a risk you’ll have to take. Then create a no-ip IP with the port your gonna use. Make your private servers IP be the one on No-IP, and the port that you opened. Then it works.

Read full topic
